    • Method Detail

      • pixelOrPercent

        public static boolean pixelOrPercent(java.lang.String coord)
                              throws CoordException
        Check string is integer or percent. Example: 100 or 100% is true.
        Parameters:
        coord - Value to check.
        Returns:
        boolean Value is an integer number or a percent.
        Throws:
        CoordException - Value is not an integer number or a percent.

      • checkDateFormat

        public static boolean checkDateFormat(java.lang.String dateFormat)
        Check string is correct format to date used by app.
        Parameters:
        dateFormat - Value to check.
        Returns:
        boolean Value is date format correct or incorrect.

      • isValidString

        public static boolean isValidString(java.lang.String value)
        Check value valid to property.
        Parameters:
        value - value property to check
        Returns:
        true if valid, false if invalid

      • checkPattern

        public static boolean checkPattern(PatternController pattern)
        Check pattern have values to properties url, height and width.
        Parameters:
        pattern - Pattern to check
        Returns:
        boolean pattern correct or incorrect.
